pokedexEntries.red: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedexEntries.blue: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedexEntries.yellow: Tough fights could excite this Pokémon. When excited, it may blow out bluish-white flames.
pokedexEntries.gold: It is very hot-headed by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.
pokedexEntries.silver: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.crystal: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedexEntries.emerald: Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedexEntries.diamond: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.pearl: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.platinum: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: It is very hot-headed by nature, so it constantly seeks opponents. It calms down only when it wins.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.black: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.white: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.black2: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.white2: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
pokedexEntries.x: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.y: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Charmeleon mercilessly destroys its foes using its sharp claws. If it encounters a strong foe, it turns aggressive. In this excited state, the flame at the tip of its tail flares with a bluish white color.
